effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

short_effect.x_y: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.x_y: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
